body:
Standard BLAS routines expect 32-bit integers, which is insufficient on some modern 64-bit systems with large amounts of memory. This variant builds a 64-bit version of OpenBLAS as well, which expects 64-bit integers (and adds a suffix "64_" to function names).

This variant requires a tool "objconv" that is also packaged.
title: Add ilp64 variant of OpenBLAS
